TitlePage.Title: SmallClassNr
TitlePage.Subtitle: Library of groups with small class number
TitlePage.Author:
Sam Tertooy
Wiskunde
KU Leuven, Kulak Kortrijk Campus
Etienne Sabbelaan 53
8500 Kortrijk
Belgium
sam.tertooy@kuleuven.be https://stertooy.github.io/
TitlePage.Abstract: The SmallClassNr package provides access to finite groups with small class number. Currently, the package contains the finite groups of class number at most 14.
